name: gatsby-source-wordpress-experimental
description: Source data from WPGraphQL in an efficient and scalable way.
author: Tyler Barnes <tylerdbarnes@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run test
scripts.setup-test-runtime: yarn build && cd test-runtime && rm -rf ./node_modules/gatsby-source-wordpress-experimental && yarn install --check-files && rm -rf ./node_modules/gatbsy-source-wordpress-experimental/test-runtime
scripts.ci: yarn prepare && yarn setup-test-runtime && yarn test
scripts.test-schema: yarn clean-test-runtime && WPGRAPHQL_INCREMENT=false jest ./test-runtime/__tests__/schema.js && WPGQL_INCREMENT=true jest ./test-runtime/__tests__/schema.js
scripts.test-build: yarn clean-test-runtime && WPGRAPHQL_INCREMENT=false jest ./test-runtime/__tests__/build.js && WPGQL_INCREMENT=true jest ./test-runtime/__tests__/build.js
scripts.test: yarn setup-test-runtime && yarn test-schema && yarn test-build
